Futility UI

a lightweight framework for practical web development.

Table of contents:

Web Page Templates

  • 404.html (error page)
  • index.html (this page)
  • typography.html (typopgraphy examples)
  • tables.html (table examples)

CSS Starter Files

  • css/base.css (base elements & variables)
  • css/util.css (utility classes, based on Tailwind and Bootstrap 4)
  • css/devices.css (tablet & desktop overrides)

Get Started

  1. Install packages with yarn install
  2. Run yarn start to launch the static server
  3. View the generated files in the dist folder at http://localhost:3000
See the README.md file for more info!
